data.title: Jerry Roberts Live at Mr Vic's Bar and Restaurant - What's On In Barbados
data.meta_description: Live Guitar music and Vocals by Jerry Roberts, playing a variety of genres. Dine under the stars at Mr Vic’s Bar and Restaurant.   Jerry... Full Event Details
data.text:
Live Guitar music and Vocals by Jerry Roberts, playing a variety of genres.

Dine under the stars at Mr Vic’s Bar and Restaurant.

Jerry Roberts has been a musician for over 50 years. He can’t read music, but can play anything he hears. Jerry has played all over the USA, Canada and Europe, He was for a time the bass player for Zulu, the back up band for Jefferson Starship. He also appeared on BB King, Nancy Wilson and Midnight Special TV shows.

Mr Vic’s Bar, established in 2010, is known for great food and great music nights. It has been awarded the Certificate for Excellence by Trip Advisor for its food and service, serving a mix of Caribbean and English food.

Doors opened at 5:00pm

Dinner served from 6:30pm

Music from 7:30pm till late.

Reservations recommended.

Call 432-5616

Admission free.
